info.title: Navigate into the end of a grid in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterGrid
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the grid
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the grid
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the last cell in the grid. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the last cell.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the last cell in the grid. Note: you may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the grid and the last cell.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the last column header ('Balance') is conveyed
Text of the last cell ('$995,532.00') is conveyed
Coordinates of the last cell (column 5, row 7) are conveyed
